title: recipes_New_England_Bean_Dip
text:
Title: New England Bean Dip.
.
Description: I live in New England. This is a creamy dip made with red kidney beans. This kidney bean dip is great as an appetizer with crackers..
.
Ingredients:.
- 2 cups canned kidney beans, drained.
- 1 small onion, minced.
- 0.5 cup mayonnaise.
- 0.5 cup sweet pickle relish.
- 1 pinch dry mustard.
- 1 dash Worcestershire sauce.
- 0.5 teaspoon white horseradish.
- 0.125 teaspoon garlic powder.
- 0.125 teaspoon salt.
- 0.125 teaspoon ground black pepper.
.
Instructions:.
- Rinse kidney beans; set aside to drain..
- Stir together onion, mayonnaise, relish, dry mustard, Worcestershire sauce, horseradish, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl..
- Gently mix in kidney beans until coated with dressing. Refrigerate until serving..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 355 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 33 g.
cholesterolContent: 10 mg.
fiberContent: 9 g.
proteinContent: 8 g.
saturatedFatContent: 3 g.
sodiumContent: 757 mg.
sugarContent: 10 g.
fatContent: 23 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 4 servings.
